steps.title: Select Rest Entry
steps.body: click on the quarter rest button to open up the enter rests tool above the keyboard.

steps.title: Select the Rest
steps.body: now, the notes transform into rests. Select the rest you want to enter.

steps.title: Exit rests tool
steps.body: To return to regular note entry, click on the quarter note. this will change all the notes back to regular notes.

steps.title: Edit Rests
steps.body: learn how to edit a note thats already entered
